question: Which company produces patisiran?
ideal_answer: Patisiran has been developed by Alnylam Pharmaceuticals.

snippets.text: Patisiran has been developed by Alnylam Pharmaceuticals; it was recently approved in the USA for the treatment of the polyneuropathy of hereditary TTR-mediated amyloidosis (hATTR) in adults and subsequently approved in the EU for the treatment of hATTR in adults with stage 1 or 2 polyneuropathy.
